outputs.output_descr: According to the Second MDG Report, Kosovo scores poorly in being able to achieve all the eight MDGs by 2015, specifically MDG 1 (Eradicate Extreme Poverty and Hunger) and in terms of non-income dimensions of poverty.   Kosovo will need to step up efforts rapidly in accordance with its commitment made when the Assembly of Kosovo endorsed the Millennium Declaration on 17th of October 2008, thereby formally committing itself to work towards attainment of MDGs by 2015

Engagement of the Private Sector in the MDGs through advocacy and policy dialogue, business-partnership initiatives and mainstreaming of corporate social responsibility principles (and Social Inclusion).

project_descr: The objective of this project is to create an enabling environment for attainment of the Millennium Development Goals by 2015 and advancement of Social Inclusion with the Private Sector and Development Partners.
project_title: Roadmap to the Achievement of the MDGs in Kosovo
